TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK_DISPLAY_OBJECT extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 指定用图像显示任务板上的任务或背景时所需的图像类型和数据。

span.span: Specifies the type of image and data that is required to use the image to display a task or the background on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关用 MMC \_ 任务 \_ 显示 \_ 对象结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台（MMC）进行编程的详细信息，请参阅[mmc 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK\_DISPLAY\_OBJECT structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
